description: A React functional component defining a Sidebar UI element for Atlassian Dashboard, including service selection (Jira and Confluence) with context integration and routing logic.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main functional component for rendering the sidebar with service selection buttons.

methods.name: JiraIcon
methods.description: SVG component rendering the Jira icon.

methods.name: ConfluenceIcon
methods.description: SVG component rendering the Confluence icon.
